June 16, 1984 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a

Oceans
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Chorus: 'We Bow Our Heads' - J. S. Bach: 1 Mount Charles, 80 2 Kernow Brass, 65 3 Redruth Town, 60 4 St Dennis, 50
Best Player: Barry Trudgian, euphonium, Kernow Brass
Special Awards Best Soprano: Vernon Powell, Kernow Brass Best Cornet: Peter Goldsworthy, St. Keverne Best Euphonium: Barry Trudgian, Kernow Brass Best Horn: Graham Luke, Bugle Best Set of Basses: Kernow Brass
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Karen Triggs, Nicholas Hitchens
Deportment (judge WO Roberts): 1 Torrington (Class C) 2 Bugle (Class B)
July 17, 2010, 11:51 a.m. Aug. 6, 2013, 10:09 a.m.
